title: MixedTypeEnumTest
description: Test schema for various enum type combinations

pureStringEnum.description: A pure string enum with valid identifiers

pureStringEnumWithInvalidSymbols.description: A pure string enum where symbols need prefixing (start with digits)

pureIntEnum.description: A pure integer enum - should become int with doc hint

mixedStringIntEnum.description: Mixed string/int enum like jfrogCliVersion - needs string in union for backcompat

mixedStringIntEnumWithValidSymbols.description: Mixed enum where string values are valid identifiers
